metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the Gur Leader after the threeway dialog with her and Entrance Guard happened.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Gur CampApproach the camp and talk to Gur Leader and the Entrance Guard.Click on the Entrance Guard.

0.speaker: Ulma
0.text: Too many have fallen, but our vengeance shall burn brighter than any pyre.

1.speaker: Ulma
1.text: I would see that vampire burn, no matter what the cost.
